segments.text: Oh no, I can see the water gushing over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is soaked, and she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, just polishing that plate like it's the only thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading fast across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look at that boy on the stool; it's tilting backward dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could hit his head or break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there too, so close to the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching for cookies, but this whole setup screams accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting wet, and who knows what damage that's causing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes my heart race just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but it's too risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
